short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds diff after links to commits in PRs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds diff lines above each commit in a github PR view.  Click the line to see all the comments in one diff after that line.

1.0.3 - Fix top pr link
1.0.2 - Fixes for repo links, and use Pr-relative for comparisons so you can comment on them
1.0.1 - Major performance improvements
